binding:binding.name: Ecobee Binding
binding:binding.description: Monitor and control Ecobee thermostats and their remote sensors using the cloud-based API.
binding:binding.author: John Cocula

parameter.name: appkey
parameter.label: API Key
parameter.description: Private API key issued to you by Ecobee to use the API.

parameter.name: scope
parameter.label: Scope
parameter.description: Application scope used when authorizing the binding (multiple allowed, comma-separated).

parameter.name: granularity
parameter.label: Poll Granularity
parameter.description: Rate at which to check if poll is to run, in milliseconds.

parameter.name: quickpoll
parameter.label: Quick Poll
parameter.description: Time in milliseconds to wait after successful update, command or action before refresh.

parameter.name: tempscale
parameter.label: Temperature Scale
parameter.description: Temperature scale to use when sending or receiving temperatures.
